tool_description: Look up US cities, states, and ZIP codes using this LiveAddress endpoint. Get ZIP codes for a city/state, and get cities/states for a ZIP code. Batch lookups supported.
name: LiveAddress - City-state-zip lookups
title: LiveAddress - City-state-zip lookups

api_list.name: City/state/zip lookups
api_list.description: Look up and verify city/state/zip data

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: The name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response. Typically only used for cross-domain JSONP requests with Javascript.
